mapper.select: SELECT CB.NO, M.NICK, CB.TITLE, CB.CONTENT, CB.ENROLL_DATE, CB.HIT, CB.DEL_YN, CB.MEMBER_NO FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CB JOIN MEMBER M ON CB.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CB.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY CB.NO DESC

SELECT CB.NO, CB.MEMBER_NO, CB.TITLE, CB.CONTENT, M.NICK, CB.ENROLL_DATE, CB.HIT, CB.DEL_YN FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CB JOIN MEMBER M ON CB.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE CB.ENROLL_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE - 1 AND SYSDATE AND CB.DEL_YN = 'N' -- DEL_YN이 'N'인 데이터만 필터링 ORDER BY CB.HIT DESC FETCH FIRST 3 ROWS ONLY

SELECT CB.NO, M.NICK, CB.TITLE, CB.CONTENT, CB.ENROLL_DATE, CB.HIT, CB.DEL_YN, CB.MEMBER_NO, COUNT(CMT.NO) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CB JOIN MEMBER M ON CB.MEMBER_NO = M.NO LEFT JOIN COMMT CMT ON CB.NO = CMT.BOARD_NO AND CMT.DEL_YN = 'N' WHERE CB.DEL_YN = 'N' AND CB.NO = #{no} GROUP BY CB.NO, M.NICK, CB.TITLE, CB.CONTENT, CB.ENROLL_DATE, CB.HIT, CB.DEL_YN, CB.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY CB.NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY_BOARD SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE COMMUNITY_BOARD SET LIKES = LIKES + 1 WHERE NO = #{no}
UPDATE COMMUNITY_BOARD SET LIKES = LIKES -1 WHERE NO = #{no}
